sf_description: Kafka metrics. Created by SignalFx through service discovery.

allPlotProgramText: find(refresh=300000,query='sf_metric:collectd.GenericJMX.kafka-all-messages-in.counter AND sf_organizationID:##ORGID## AND NOT sf_metric:_*') -> fetch(extrapolation='LAST_VALUE_EXTRAPOLATION',maxExtrapolations=1000) -> groupby('sf_source') -> stats:!max -> _SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_4=id -> publish(defaultSource='_SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_4',metric='_SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_4',sf_uiAnalyticsDerivedMetric=1,sf_uiHelper='##CHARTID##_4')

find(refresh=300000,query='sf_metric:collectd.GenericJMX.kafka-all-bytes-in.counter AND sf_organizationID:##ORGID## AND NOT sf_metric:_*') -> fetch -> groupby('sf_source') -> stats:!max -> _SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_2=id -> publish(defaultSource='_SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_2',metric='_SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_2',sf_uiAnalyticsDerivedMetric=1,sf_uiHelper='##CHARTID##_2')

find(refresh=300000,query='sf_metric:collectd.GenericJMX.kafka-all-messages-in.counter AND sf_organizationID:##ORGID## AND NOT sf_metric:_*') -> fetch(extrapolation='LAST_VALUE_EXTRAPOLATION',maxExtrapolations=1000) -> groupby('sf_source') -> stats:!max -> _SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_4=id -> publish(defaultSource='_SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_4',metric='_SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_4',sf_uiAnalyticsDerivedMetric=1,sf_uiHelper='##CHARTID##_4')

sf_description: ratio of bytes out : bytes in
